The platform seeks to advance its scope in R&D in Homomorphic Encryption, Federal learning, and proof- of- identity. Then it will combine its efforts with the radically changing FitScore technology to achieve its goal of true hiring automation.

Author: Soheil Nasseri
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] TalentSnap (TSC) - Leveraging Decentralized AI to Disrupt Hiring!
Body: Airdrops & Bounty Campaign Coming Soon!  TalentSnap is building zero-knowledge proof technology that will automate the hiring process. We are doing so by building Artificial Intelligence technology that will work on decentralized, encrypted, and verified data, while giving control and ownership back to the people. Our AI tech is based on a something we’ve built called FitScore, which analyzes thousands of indicators to determine perfect fit between candidates and employers. Bringing this technology on the blockchain will automate hiring in a very safe way that is beneficial to everyone involved.  Pre-ICO Starts August 10st, 2018! Public Crowd Sale: October 1st, 2018 Soft Cap: 2,000 ETH Hard Cap: 40,000 ETH  Get more information at TalentSnap.co!  WhitePaper: https://talentsnap.co/whitepaper.pdf Telegram: https://t.me/talentsnap Twitter: https://twitter.com/TalentSnap LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/talentsnap/ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/TalentSnap/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/talentsnap/ Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5U_Yyvsa7ZkYKBTnoc4Mnw Medium: https://medium.com/@TalentSnap
